name: Scribnia
tag_list: find, writers, online, blogger, author, reader, review, discover, rating, recommendation, community
overview:
Scribnia is the new way to review and discover the greatest writers on the web.

Writers are ranked based on ratings and reviews submitted by users a.k.a. critics. A recommendation algorithm then analyzes the ratings and reviews submitted by a user, and recommends to them other online writers they might like.

Writers also receive â€œContext ratingsâ€ which are metrics specifically tailored to each authorâ€™s subject matter. For example, sports bloggers are rated on criteria like hometown bias, reliance on statistics, and tone (humorous vs. serious). Users can â€œfilterâ€ for authors that meet these criteria, allowing them to search deeply through the blogosphere.

Their service is also geared toward bloggers who want to promote their work or connect with their readers. Bloggers can claim their profile at Scribnia and choose from a variety of Scribnia widgets which can allow their readers to view their ranking, writer reviews, read reviews and more….

milestones.description: Scribnia.com was sold to Marc Duquette of Tribu Virtual inc.  Team members David Spinks and Saad Mukhtar remain on board the Scribnia team.
